数据输入ResultIn
卡号序号 卡号 金额 日期 源地址 目标地址
176 a8492d3a83bf2d249449362b94b47a9d 236000 14 3900 0000
176 a8492d3a83bf2d249449362b94b47a9d 1000 46 3900 0000
176 a8492d3a83bf2d249449362b94b47a9d 236000 46 3900 0000
176 a8492d3a83bf2d249449362b94b47a9d 237000 71 3900 0000
6 7416efe50e56881ee80dd907ddef0898 5000000 61 0000 0000
6 7416efe50e56881ee80dd907ddef0898 2700000 68 0000 0000
6 f7d1c69a3eba501af3fa5900caaafe9d 5000000 70 0000 0000
57 c12164aa9a636260e64064bd7746e51e 620000 45 2600 2600
57 a19710882891098a579be75a8dc078ca 80000 45 2600 2600
57 328de1a2ae365437be5ea979e4aa96e7 500000 82 2600 2600

MapInFile('ResultIn.txt','SortedIn.txt')中
根据sortedlist = sorted(data, key = lambda x:(int(x[0]), int(x[3])) )  
根据卡号序号和日期进行排序

0 0de23d5a12483870efc37e0b595fdfb3 50000 308 0000 4500

0 0de23d5a12483870efc37e0b595fdfb3 50000 340 0000 4500

1 05afc7588ca41984c616a65e20bd2612 100000 23 0000 0000

1 05afc7588ca41984c616a65e20bd2612 20000 87 0000 0000

1 0ecdf3670ae886370b09cfbd3ba73e48 20000 306 0000 0000

2 6742dcad1115f917960c697bac111c2e 50000 86 0000 0000

2 6742dcad1115f917960c697bac111c2e 900000 86 0000 0000

2 6742dcad1115f917960c697bac111c2e 50000 87 0000 0000

3 b0e8f85b41000194c1b8504a41bc3e44 230000 84 0000 0000
。。。。
不过上面出来的默认有些空格，把它变成SortedInNew.txt
0 0de23d5a12483870efc37e0b595fdfb3 50000 308 0000 4500
0 0de23d5a12483870efc37e0b595fdfb3 50000 340 0000 4500
1 05afc7588ca41984c616a65e20bd2612 100000 23 0000 0000
1 05afc7588ca41984c616a65e20bd2612 20000 87 0000 0000
1 0ecdf3670ae886370b09cfbd3ba73e48 20000 306 0000 0000
2 6742dcad1115f917960c697bac111c2e 50000 86 0000 0000
2 6742dcad1115f917960c697bac111c2e 900000 86 0000 0000
2 6742dcad1115f917960c697bac111c2e 50000 87 0000 0000
3 b0e8f85b41000194c1b8504a41bc3e44 230000 84 0000 0000


Out同理
